items.text: direct hit! They tried to pinch a single, but Dhawan's throw from short fine-leg hits the stumps. Whipped off the back foot for a quick run, and replays show the batsmen are safe
items.postText: Stat alert: Liton Das' 33-ball fifty is the second fastest by any batsman against India in ODI finals. The fastest is 32 balls by Symonds in 2003-04 VB series final.
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, and spinning further away. Liton backed away to cut, but he's forced to reach at the ball moving away. Mistimes the shot to point
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length ball outside leg stump, and spinning into the right hander. Tapped off the back foot with soft hands to see the over out
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, and clipped off the front foot to square leg. They walk across for one
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover. The ball dribbles away
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full just outside off once again. Pinpoint accuracy, but defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, and he drives with the angled bat to mid on. No chance of a run though
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.text: edges a cut to the third-man boundary! Was too close to his body, but he went for the shot anyway. Just past Dhoni's right.
items.postText: First hundred-run stand for Bangladesh openers in 27 ODIs. The last one came in December 2016. SG: "This is why I'm not a big fan of resting important players before the final, especially bowlers, they lose their rhythm."
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off stump, and he offers the bat's full face to defend. Drinks
items.postText: Oliver B: "Perfect time to bring Jadhav on. Need to keep batsmen guessing and give Jadhav a real test under pressure."
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: hameed ur rashe: "100+ opening stands for Ban vs Ind: 102 T Iqbal - S Sarkar, Mirpur, 2015 102 Liton Das - M Hasan, Dubai, 2018 100+ opening stands in Asia Cup finals: 137 S Jayasuriya - M Atapattu v Ind, RPS, 1997 102 Liton Das - M Hasan, Dubai, 2018"
items.text: full just outside off stump. He takes a big stride forward and drives through to wide long off
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: dabbed! Length ball on off stump, and he stays on the back foot, before playing a teasing late cut past Dhoni's right. Short third man gives it a chase
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length on leg stump, and worked off his hips to square leg. They scamper across for one
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: flighted just outside off stump. Mehidy uses the bat's angle, and clips this away to midwicket for another run
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, and pushed down the ground past the bowler's left to long off
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: overpitched on middle stump, and Mehidy raises his back leg to get the full swing of his bat. Strikes a straight-drive right back to the bowler, who does well to get down and intercept the shot
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full outside off stump, and Liton gets down on one foot, and check-sweeps this past the fielder at square leg! No one there near fine leg, and the ball races away for four more
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball just outside off stump. Cut off the back foot to point
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full on off, and he comes onto the front foot for a defensive shot
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.text: carbon copy of that previous sweep! Full on off again, and Liton goes across the line early and then times that sweep to perfection behind square
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: good length just outside off, and he cuts this off the back foot to point
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length ball on off stump, and fended with the bat's open face to cover point
items.postText: Bangladesh dominating after 20 overs of play. Where will the breakthrough come from? Here's Varun Shetty again, back for another spell of commentary.
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: Thanks Sreshth. Offspinners galore. He's Jadhav.
items.text: drops it short at a middle stump line and he gets back to pull to deep square
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: length on middle stump, allows it to come on and tickles it through square leg
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length on middle stump, leans in and nudges it to square leg's left...he throws badly at the striker's end and gives away another run
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up at off stump, down the track to flick but this rolls down the pitch off the leading edge
items.shortText: Jadhav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run
